about_the_game:
About our demo

Dungeons Deep is a non-linear dungeon crawler set in a dark fantasy world. In this demo you'll experience one of the the early levels in the game, with some higher tier items and enemies added for you to try out.

Please keep in mind that Dungeons Deep is in Pre-Alpha. Everything is subject to change before release.

GAME FEATURES

  • Almost a dozen enemy types in the demo

  • Fight through a detailed dungeon level from our game.

  • Omni-directional aiming based combat.

  • Bloody dismemberment system. What good is hacking and slashing if nothing comes off?

Deeply satisfying combat

Enemy difficulty in Dungeons Deep is largely based on the different tactics and behaviors of the creatures you're fighting. In many cases they will learn what you’re doing and change tactics. Mistakes will be punished. In order to survive you must learn your enemies' weaknesses, and exploit them quickly.

Loot vomit!

Dozens of satisfying loot options over several rarity types that will boost your abilities and help you specialize your character.

content_descriptors.notes: There are blood effects from getting hit with attacks and a dismember system for enemies.

name: Dungeons Deep Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, 64 Bit
  • Processor: intel i5 8400 | AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 6GBs VRAM | NVIDIA GTX-1060 | AMD Radeon RX 590
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 11 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Dungeons Deep is in development, and the recommended specifications may change.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, 64 Bit
  • Processor: intel i7 8700 | AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 8GBs VRAM | NVIDIA RTX-2080 | AMD Radeon RX 6700
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 11 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Dungeons Deep is in development, and the recommended specifications may change.
